alert.note: Alert for Barry; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Stone and Barry Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 345 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Washburn to near Seligman to near Gateway. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roaring River State Park... Table Rock Lake... Cassville... Shell Knob... Seligman... Exeter... Butterfield... Washburn... Golden... Emerald Beach... Eagle Rock... Chain-O-Lakes... Arrow Point... Jenkins... Wayne... Mcdowell... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
